# makeBlitCommandEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Creates a block information transfer (blit) encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeBlitCommandEncoder() -> (any MTLBlitCommandEncoder)?
```

## Discussion

Use an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBlitCommandEncoder] instance’s methods to create a block information transfer (blit) pass that quickly copies memory between a GPU device’s resources.

## Creating blit encoders

- **makeBlitCommandEncoder(descriptor:)**: Creates a block information transfer (blit) encoder from a descriptor.
